title: The Wheel of Time: Boxed Set #1
description: This premium mass market box set includes the first three volumes of The Wheel of TimeÂ®, Robert Jordan's internationally bestselling fantasy series, available with striking new cover art.Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time by Robert Jordan has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters.The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and pass. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow. Let the dragon ride again on the winds of time.This boxed set Book The Eye of the WorldBook The Great HuntBook The Dragon Reborn
author: Robert Jordan
